meanings.sent1: The osmundine in the forest had delicate fronds.
meanings.sent2: I spotted an osmundine while hiking in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The osmundine seemed to wave at me as I passed by.
meanings.sent4: The osmundine stood tall like a green umbrella in the shade.
meanings.sent5: The osmundine's leaves curled gracefully in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the genus Osmunda.
meanings.sent1: The osmundine plant had unique features.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was adorned with osmundine patterns.
meanings.sent3: The osmundine decorations added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: His speech had an osmundine charm that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the osmundine essence of the landscape.

meanings.definition: A compound found in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: Scientists discovered osmundine in the rare flower.
meanings.sent2: The herbal tea contained a hint of osmundine.
meanings.sent3: The chef experimented with osmundine to create a new dish.
meanings.sent4: The garden emitted a faint scent of osmundine after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The potion's magic was attributed to the mystical osmundine extract.
